short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds favicons, temporary memory for links, RegExp and awesome CSS styles!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This addon makes coolakov.ru most_promoted tool much easier to use.
It adds favicons to links and an additional text field where you will be able to save links. So you'll never need to manually look to links again!

Also it adds RegExp and settings like FontSize, FontStyle and others.

And awesome CSS styling helps too. Now you don't need to scroll down every time you need to submit new query.
